vote.title: To approve Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) #2023-01, executed between representatives of the City of Columbus and the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees, Local 1632 to enact an incentive pay program for eligible employees in the Department of Public Service, Department of Recreation and Parks and Department of Finance which permits eligible employees to serve as CDL trainers and equipment trainers and to receive additional compensation as outlined in MOU 2023-01; and to declare an emergency.
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
